long_description: The Ruffwear Slackline Leash adjusts to be multifunctional: the handle can be hand-held or waist-worn; the length can be fully extended for relaxed walks, or shortened for more control when needed. Adjustable length from 3.5 - 6 ft. via the ergonomic slider. Ergonomic design makes the all-metal, strong and secure Talon Clip(TM) easy to clip on the dog's collar. Adjustable padded handle, with durable plastic buckle, can be hand-held, waist-worn or secured around a tree or post. Convenient accessory loop for pickup bags or small clip-on items. Ruffwear Slackline Leash has reflective trim. Closeout.
short_description: The Ruffwear Slackline Leash adjusts to be multifunctional: the handle can be hand-held or waist-worn; the length can be fully extended for relaxed walks, or shortened for more control when needed.
